DOC.brief_summary: The creation multi-center cooperative research group encompass academic community-based spinal practice . . .
DOC.brief_title: Neurosurgery Patient Outcomes Treating Spinal Disorders
DOC.criteria: Grade I degenerative isthmic spondylolisthesis recalcitrant noninvasive therapy least 3 month Lumbar degenerative disc herniation radiculopathy refractory noninvasive therapy least 6 week History previous lumbar spine surgery Significant motor weakness ( 3/5 ) ( i.e . foot drop ) Cancer , infection , fracture Pregnancy
